column4: guys.. someone please help me with this X window system problem..
I've just upgraded to breezy and i still can't get X to run
and I get the same error
error:  could not open default font 'fixed';
I'm having no problems apart from this
well, I think I've got a problem that no one seems to have :(
not a card issue.. a font issue
upgraded to breezy and all hell broke lose
have you installed ubuntu-base and ubuntu-desktop ??

try that.. they depend on all the packages that are necessary.. people have commented that during upgrades you need to install them.. I didn't, and had issues.. but managed to get around it by installing those
i doubt ubuntu-desktop would do anything for my problem
sure? may depend on all the necessary fonts
interesting that I can see a lot of true type fonts that ubuntu-base depends on
